subject: Baseball
Trades (Sports)
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The White Sox were eager to trade Jake Peavy. The Red Sox were eager to acquire him. But it took the possible Biogenesis suspensions to make the deal happen.
snippet: The White Sox were eager to trade Jake Peavy. The Red Sox were eager to acquire him. But it took the possible Biogenesis suspensions to make the deal happen.
